title: VanEck believes Solana can grow 10,000% in value if it onboards 100M users
description:
Asset management firm VanEck believes Solana could see a 10,000% growth in value by 2030 if the blockchain attracts 100 million users, according to a new research report. The most striking prediction from the report suggests that SOL could experience a 10,600% price rally by the year 2030, potentially reaching $3,211.28 per token. Comparatively, Ethereum’s […]

The post VanEck believes Solana can grow 10,000% in value if it onboards 100M users appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Analysis of Bitcoin vs. Gold and their Performance Amid Israel-Hamas Conflict

title: AI Regulation in Healthcare: Challenges and Slow Progress
description: The deployment of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in the healthcare sector has been rapidly gaining ground, yet the lack of clear regulatory guidelines is raising concerns about patient safety and data privacy. title: US Senator Asks DOJ To Consider Criminal Charges Against Binance and Tether Over Alleged Illicit Finance Links
description:
US Senator Cynthia Lummis (R-WY) says the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) should press criminal charges against Binance crypto exchange and Tether over their alleged involvement in financing illicit activity. Lummis says that she is asking the DOJ to conclude its investigation on Binance and USDT-maker Tether and to “consider criminal charges” against the two […]

The post US Senator Asks DOJ To Consider Criminal Charges Against Binance and Tether Over Alleged Illicit Finance Links appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
